trans-unit.source: Interacts with the parser to build an <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Interage com o parser para criar um <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: The HtmlSelectBuilder control interacts with the page parser to build an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: O controlo de HtmlSelectBuilder interage com o analisador de página para criar um <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: Use the HtmlSelectBuilder control to customize the parsing of an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o controlo de HtmlSelectBuilder para personalizar a analisar um <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelectBuilder.AllowWhitespaceLiterals%2A> property is set to `false` so that white space is always ignored.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelectBuilder.AllowWhitespaceLiterals%2A>propriedade está definida como `false` para que o espaço em branco é sempre ignorado.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelectBuilder.AllowWhitespaceLiterals%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelectBuilder.GetChildControlType%2A> method to determine the type of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control's child controls.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelectBuilder.GetChildControlType%2A>método para determinar o tipo do <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controlos de subordinados do controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelectBuilder.GetChildControlType%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelectBuilder"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelectBuilder"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the white space literals in an <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control are to be processed or ignored.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o branco espaço literais num <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> controlo está a ser processada ou ignoradas.

trans-unit.source: This method overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.AllowWhitespaceLiterals%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to always ignore white space in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: Este método substitui o <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.AllowWhitespaceLiterals%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método para ignorar sempre o espaço em branco no <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> </xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.AllowWhitespaceLiterals%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This method always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, indicating that white space in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Este método devolve sempre <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, indicando que espaço em branco no <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> controlo é ignorado.

trans-unit.source: Obtains the <xref:System.Type> for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control's child controls.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref:System.Type>para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> controlos de subordinados do controlo.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Use the GetChildControlType method to return the <xref:System.Type> of a specified child control in an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o método GetChildControlType para devolver o <xref:System.Type>de um controlo subordinado especificado num <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> </xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The tag name of the child control.
trans-unit.target: O nome de tag do controlo subordinado.

trans-unit.source: An array of attributes contained in the child control.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de atributos contido no controlo subordinado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control's specified child control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Type>do <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> controlo da especificado controlo subordinado.</xref:System.Type>
